text: Gamil Ratib (جميل راتب, November 28, 1926 - September 19, 2018) was an Egyptian actor. He was known for his roles in Lawrence of Arabia, Poussière de diamant, and in The Aquarium. Ratib was born in Cairo, Egypt. He died in Cairo on September 19, 2018 at the age of 91.Egyptian-French Actor Gamil Ratib Dies at 91 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Actors from Cairo
title: Gamil Ratib
